about_the_game:
This add-on brings the new side missions to every main-story contract. Total - 17 missions! In the future, this collection will be replenished...
Did you passed every contract with perfect efficiency at the highest difficulty? There are no more bandits in Mexico? Have all pirates exterminated? If you look around, real heroes always could earn a little money at the side. Sure, it is nice to reward the most nimble, clever and cunning.

  • You will survive against an entire drug cartel, an army or a massive attack of pirates.
  • You will complete a difficult task to eliminate a particularly dangerous group of enemies in harsh conditions when reinforcements arrive.
  • You will enjoy an energetic escape through an ambush bandits, enemy troops or hunters for your heads.
  • You could hunt for the enemy leaders.
  • You will find a secret commando task in the enemy territory.
  • You should free the hostage!

Have difficulty, but it is interesting. Can you do that? Will you be able to complete all the tasks?
Each run of the mission will contain the new conditions and new tactics, this means that this is a new adventure!!!
detailed_description:
New DLC Available

We hasten to please you by the wonderful news!
This is something new and interesting!



We're back to supporting of our game on Steam. A recently released patch has corrected many errors, including ones which have been noticed by you, dear players. And today you can find a DLC in the store. This DLC contains a large collection of new maps, challenging your tactical talent. The number of missions provided by this DLC is close to that number in the original game. We offer a mission of survival, escape, rescue the hostages In different conditions you will be offered a mission of survival, escape, liberation of the hostages, the destruction of enemy forces and the enemy leaders and something else.

There is still a lot of interesting things. We are going to expand the game more and more!

We are looking forward for your views. Each of your remark goes in our favor. Your criticism and suggestions help us make the game better!!!


About the Game

This add-on brings the new side missions to every main-story contract. Total - 17 missions! In the future, this collection will be replenished...
Did you passed every contract with perfect efficiency at the highest difficulty? There are no more bandits in Mexico? Have all pirates exterminated? If you look around, real heroes always could earn a little money at the side. Sure, it is nice to reward the most nimble, clever and cunning.

  • You will survive against an entire drug cartel, an army or a massive attack of pirates.
  • You will complete a difficult task to eliminate a particularly dangerous group of enemies in harsh conditions when reinforcements arrive.
  • You will enjoy an energetic escape through an ambush bandits, enemy troops or hunters for your heads.
  • You could hunt for the enemy leaders.
  • You will find a secret commando task in the enemy territory.
  • You should free the hostage!

Have difficulty, but it is interesting. Can you do that? Will you be able to complete all the tasks?
Each run of the mission will contain the new conditions and new tactics, this means that this is a new adventure!!!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS or higher, Steam OS
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: SB16 compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS or higher, Steam OS
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with latest graphics drivers
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: SB16 compatible
